channel.title: Dead
channel.description:
How can I make it so if a player kills a NPC, while wielding an item, they get a certain drop?
If the player kills a cyclops wielding a bronze defender, they either recieve or get as a drop an iron defender.
Thanks.

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Thanks _ and primadude! Really good help!

//NPCtypeID=item,minAmoutToDrop-maxAmountToDrop,chance:outOf;item2,minAmount-maxAmount,chance:outOf
//Example of a man dropping random number of 1 to 100 coins[0995] 10 out of 100 times
//1=995,1-100,10:100

that’s my npcdrops, how would I make it so it only drops when a certain item is equiped?

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

} else if (NPCID == 57) { if (playerHasItem(995,5000000)) { deleteItem(995,5000000); teleportToX = 2899; teleportToY = 3559; } else if (!playerHasItem(995,5000000)) { sendMessage("You need 5m to get in."); }

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

client.java:6155: playerHasItem(int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int) if (playerHasItem (995,5000000)); ^ client.java:6159: playerHasItem(int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int) if (!playerHasItem (995,5000000)); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . . hmm…Never had this error before. wL if it makes any difference, and thanks for the defender help =D

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

} else if (NPCID == 57) {
if (playerHasItem (995,5000000));
deleteItem (995,5000000);
teleportToX = 2899;
teleportToY = 3559;
if (!playerHasItem (995,5000000));
sendMessage (“You need 5m to get in”);
}

In the NPCHandler, I believe, it’s just if(NPCID == #) for when they die, so add that then add the defender to the ground.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

Thanks, will do that soon. I have a new problem.
Compile:client.java:6159: 'else' without 'if' else if (!playerHasItem (995,5000000)); ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .the code} else if (NPCID == 57) { if (playerHasItem (995,5000000)); deleteItem (995,5000000); teleportToX = 2899; teleportToY = 3559; else if (!playerHasItem (995,5000000)); sendMessage ("You need 5m to get in"); }
any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Dead
item.dc:creator: @fatwallet fatwallet
item.description:
@fatwallet wrote:

You need something like this, but this is not coded right :S

if NPC.3281 == Dead() {

addItem(1234, 1);
}

Or just go into the npcdrops.cfg and edit the Cyclops drops to that, and erase the others that are there for it.

*Note: if someone fixes up that horrible snippet up there, it would be greatly appreciated!

Read full topic
